code: import axios from'axios';import ENV from'./../config/base-env';export const getList=(params,token)=>{const queryString=new URLSearchParams(params).toString();return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/broadcasts?").concat(queryString),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const create=(params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('name',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.name);formData.set('whatsapp',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.whatsapp);formData.set('email',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.email);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/broadcast/"),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const detail=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/broadcast/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const update=(id,params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('name',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.name);formData.set('whatsapp',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.whatsapp);formData.set('email',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.email);formData.set('_method','PUT');return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/broadcast/").concat(id),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const remove=(id,token)=>{return axios.delete("".concat(ENV.API,"/broadcast/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const importExcel=(params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('excel',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.excel);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/broadcast/import"),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token,'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});};export const sentToWhatsapp=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/broadcast/whatsapp/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const sentToEmail=(id,token)=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/broadcast/email/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};
